attributes.action: Scotland voted to stay in the EU. We should hold another Independance referendum
attributes.background: Scotland is being dragged out of the EU against our will. Being an Independant Scotland will allow Scotland to apply to be in the EU. Holding another Independance Referendum ASAP will allow Scotland to do that.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132667
